mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD ( BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_ID ) VALUES ( 0, #{strTitle}, #{strDate}, #{strContent}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq, BOARD_TITLE AS strTitle, BOARD_DATE AS strDate, BOARD_CONTENT AS strContent, USER_ID AS userId FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_SEQ = #{id}
SELECT USER_ID AS userId FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq, BOARD_TITLE AS strTitle, BOARD_DATE AS strDate, USER_ID AS userId FROM FREE_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq, BOARD_TITLE AS strTitle, BOARD_DATE AS strDate, USER_ID AS userId FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE UPPER(#{search}) ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{strTitle}, BOARD_DATE = #{strDate}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{strContent} WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{id}
